collection:
It covers how we
collect, use, disclose, and store your information.

Information We Collect

We collect information to provide better services to our users.

This includes
basic information you provide us, like your name and email, and service usage
data.
sharing:
It covers how we
collect, use, disclose, and store your information.

We
do not share your data with third-party tools.

Sharing Information with Third Parties

In order to provide, maintain, protect, and improve our services, we may share
your data with third-party AI platforms.

The data shared with these platforms can
include your name and email.

We only share your data after obtaining your
explicit consent.
